keyboards.name: SVEN KB-S300
keyboards.description:
Comfortable low-profile keys and standard keyboard layout with full-size F-keys and number pad
Sleek and sturdy spill-resistant design* (*Tested under limited conditions—maximum of 60 ml liquid spillage. Do not immerse keyboard in liquid.).

keyboards.name: Logitech Illuminated Ultrathin
keyboards.description:
Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows XP or Windows Vista, USB port
Laser-etched backlit keys, Manual brightness adjustment
Elegantly designed, Ultra-thin keyboard profile

keyboards.name: Microsoft Sculpt (5KV-00001 )

keyboards.name: HP USB Slim Business Keyboard
keyboards.description: The HP USB Slim Business Keyboard is compatible with HP EliteDesk 705 G2 MT, HP EliteDesk 705 G2 SFF, HP EliteOne 705 G2 AIO and HP EliteDesk 705 G2 DM (Mini).

keyboards.name: Tecware Phantom 87 Key Mechanical Keyboard
keyboards.description: RGB BACKLIGHTING - Enhance your gaming experience with 20 preset configurations on mechanical keyboard or create a unique one to match your own system. .

monitors.name: AOC "22bf1HS"
monitors.description:

monitors.description:
20" Led HD+ monitor high resolution 1600 x 900
2 x HDMI Ports & 1 VGA Port
Fast Response Time Playing fast action games and watching action adventure movies always require fast and accurate pixel response from an LED.

monitors.name: Acer R240HY
monitors.description:
23. 8" Full HD IPS widescreen with 1920 x 1080 resolution
Response time: 4ms, refresh rate: 60Hz, Pixel Pitch: 0. 2745mm. 178 degree wide viewing angle, display colors: 16. 7M
The Zero Frame design provides maximum visibility of the screen from edge to edge.

monitors.name: Sceptre 24" Curved
monitors.description:
800R curve monitor the curved display delivers a revolutionary visual experience with a leading 1800R screen curvature as the images appear to wrap around you for an in depth, immersive experience
Hdmi, VGA & PC audio in ports.

monitors.description:
CURVED GAMING MONITOR with 100Hz refresh rate, AMD FreeSync and multiple game modes
ADVANCED QUANTUM DOT COLOR and VA panel supports up to 125% sRGB color space and darker blacks.

monitors.name: HP VH240a
monitors.description:
RESPONSE TIME — 5ms with overdrive for a smooth picture that looks crisp and fluid without motion blur
BUILT-IN SPEAKERS — Integrated audio speakers provide great sound for your content (2 watts per channel).

monitors.description:
